# total

**Instance Property**

A line item that represents the total for the payment.

## Declaration

```swift
required ApplePayLineItem total;
```

## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayLineItem].

The [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayLineItem/amount] of the `total` must be greater than or equal to zero and the [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayLineItem/label] must be non-empty to pass validation.

Provide a business name in the [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayLineItem/label] field. Use the same business name people see when they look for the charge on their bank or credit card statement, for example, `“COMPANY, INC."`.

```javascript
"total": {
    "label": "COMPANY, INC.",
    "type": "final",
    "amount": "38.06"
}
```



## Setting the total and summary line items

- **lineItems**: A set of line items that explain recurring payments and additional charges and discounts.
- **ApplePayLineItem**: A line item in a payment request—for example, total, tax, discount, or grand total.
- **ApplePayLineItemType**: A type that indicates whether a line item is final or pending.
